title: Elon Musk vs. Charlie Ergen: Battle of the Billionaires Over Spectrum
sub_head: The two moguls want rules to favor their visions for high-speed broadband service. Is there space enough for the two of them?
body:
Elon Musk was adamant.
On a call last December with Ajit Pai, the Federal Communications Commissionâ€™s chairman at the time, Mr. Musk said that if the commission considered a proposal to begin the process of opening up a certain swath of wireless frequencies for ground-based 5G service, it would pose a threat to his Starlink satellite network, according to people familiar with the discussion.
